text.headline: Operation Smile
text.text: An estimated 36% of the foundationâ€™s money went to roughly 100 organizations promoting healthcare, the Forbes examination revealed. The Trump Foundation gave more than $465,000 to both the Dana-Farber Cancer Institute and Operation Smile, which offers free surgeries to children born with cleft palates in developing countries.

text.headline: Where Did Trump's Foundation Donate Its Money? IRS Documents Reveal Surprising Answers
